Detailed Description

ObjectStyle is interface for spannable class.

See also:
BackgroundColorSpan, ClickableSpan, ForegroundColorSpan, StyleSpan, SubscriptSpan, SuperscriptSpan, TypefaceSpan, RelativeSizeSpan, StrikethroughSpan, UnderlineSpan, AlignmentSpan, BulletSpan, DrawerMarginSpan, DrawerMarginSpan
